welcome.title: Earn money effortlessly
welcome.subtitle: An ideal collaboration of blockchain technologies, partner programs and gameplay
welcome.description: At the moment we are working with USDT Token

description.title: Decentralized Networking
description.description: платформа на основе умных контрактов, которая объединяет людей со всего мира и открывает безграничные возможности новой экономической финансовой системы
description.paragraph1: No dependency on blockchains and unreasonable inflated transaction fees
description.paragraph2: Also, we are not dependent on one specific currency! We can always quickly respond to the volatility of the cryptocurrency world and work in the currency that is currently the most attractive!

techno.title: Impeccable Technology
techno.description: Decentralized marketing programs are powered by revolutionary smart contract technology. The 100x-crypto.co.in smart contract code is fully public. You can be sure of its safety and successful work in the long run.

autonomy.title: Autonomy
autonomy.desc: The 100x-crypto.co.in ecosystem is built around the technology of smart contracts, which are completely autonomous and eliminate the human factor.

conditions.title: Immutable conditions
conditions.desc: The algorithm is stored in the blockchain, so no one, even the authors of the idea, can interfere, cancel or change your transactions.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.desc: The smart contract code is kept in the public domain, and anyone can view the entire transaction history at any time. This ensures fair conditions and reliable statistics that you can rely on.

decentralization.title: Decentralization
decentralization.desc: 100x-crypto.co.in is not run by executives or administrators. The authors of the idea are the same platform participants as everyone else.

full_automation.title: Full automation
full_automation.desc: All transactions between community members take place directly from one personal wallet to another. Participants do not have accounts within the system from which to withdraw funds, since FORSAGE does not store your assets.

everything_online.title: 100% online
everything_online.desc: No hidden costs or service fees. The smart contract balance is always zero.

info: Development of a smart contract, website and back office.
Approval of the logo and corporate identity
Implementation of a Telegram bot and design of social networks
Creation of a cocktail pool with staking on Pancakeswap

user_cabinet.title: Intuitive user interface
user_cabinet.description: In your personal account you can see an interactive visualization of your structure online. You can track the number of partners, the status of active sites and other important data in real time.

accordion.name: Why is FORSAGE the best trading alternative?
list: The exchange rate of the cryptocurrency does not affect the stability of receiving the reward.
The minimum entry threshold is just a couple of cups of coffee.
No need to wait for payments - the funds instantly come to your wallet.
The reward always depends only on the work of the user himself.
The user can receive rewards indefinitely while expanding his team.

dropdown.head1: On the date of the start of cooperation

programInfo.item1Text: You did not activate the level that your downstream partner activated. This award goes to the nearest superior partner who has activated this level.
programInfo.item2Text: Your level is fully filled and the 1st cycle has been completed, but the next, more expensive level has not yet been activated.
programInfo.item3Text: is a reward that comes to you from below because one or more lower-level partners have lost their profits.
programInfo.item4Text: is a payment that goes to a higher-level due to the freezing of the site (lack of activation of the next, more expensive one sites).
